FHE.org conference 2023

The 2nd Annual FHE.org Conference on Fully Homomorphic Encryption. It is co-located with Real World Crypto 2023 and will be held in Tokyo (Japan) on March 26, 2023.

Important dates

  • Submission deadline: November 19, 2022 (firm deadline)
  • Notification of acceptance: January 25, 2023
  • Conference date: March 26, 2023

Sponsors

To be announced.

Latest updates

  • 26.09.2022: Japan to lift Covid-19 restrictions on foreign visits in October
  • 24.08.2022: Announcement of the 2nd annual FHE.org conference on Fully Homomorphic Encryption
